title: Tesla Owners Slammed With Outdoor Parking Repair Costs
description:
This is not a topic I ever thought I’d get a PR email about, but we do get all kinds of odd PR pitches these days. It’s about wear & tear on cars, particularly as it relates to outdoor parking. Incidentally, I was just talking with someone about some notable ... [continued]

The post Tesla Owners Slammed With Outdoor Parking Repair Costs appeared first on CleanTechnica.
